title: SENIOR UX DESIGNER
description:
We know it, you know it. Most companies ramble on about purpose and making the world a better place. And pretty often it feels a bit… well, forced. But we’d like to think that our story is special for real.


Our founders, Shadi Bitar and Ninos Malki, came to Sweden from Syria when they were kids. Books became their compass, guiding them through the maze of life, and helping them shape their destinies in a new world.


Their dream was bold: What if they could unlock the world of books for everyone, making knowledge and inspiration accessible to all? Fast forward a few years, and the tale of Nextory was born.


At Nextory, we've crafted a revolutionary monthly subscription that empowers our users to devour books like never before, be it through reading or listening. It's not just a product; it's a passport to endless adventure and enlightenment.


And now, we're on a quest to find a senior UX Designer for our User and Payment team, focusing on improving critical user journeys like signup and subscription across our website and internal tools. We are looking for someone as passionate as we are about making the world a happier place and enriching lives through the world of reading. Join our extraordinary team, and let's script a future where every day is a chapter of discovery, and every book is a key to a richer life.

**WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING**

**As UX Designer at Nextory, your mission will be to elevate user experiences across crucial touchpoints, including signup, subscription upgrades, account management pages, and beyond.** You’ll design and prototype web interfaces and internal tools that bring a touch of UX magic to our product.


Your responsibilities will include conducting qualitative research to uncover user pain points and opportunities, validating and refining your solutions through user testing, initiating surveys, and leading user interviews. This deep dive into user needs will inform product direction and drive meaningful changes.


You'll present your design concepts and solutions to stakeholders and key partners across the organization, sharing your UX expertise to support other teams as needed. Collaborating with an incredible team of engineers, product managers, and data experts, you’ll contribute to our shared goal of inspiring more people to read.


This position is based in Stockholm, you’ll be part of the Nextory design team, reporting to the Head of Design and working closely with a collaborative group of product designers.

**WHO YOU ARE**


We believe that you excel in early-stage product development and have a talent for uncovering pain points through both quantitative and qualitative research. You’ll fuel and refine the team’s roadmap in collaboration with the Product Manager and Engineering Manager, prioritizing initiatives that deliver the most value to users and business.


As a designer, you confidently lead the design process and consider teamwork as essential to reach team outcome goals. Your design decisions are driven by data and real user insights, balancing speed and precision. You improve your solutions iteratively, leveraging feedback from users, team members, and stakeholders to achieve outcomes that lead your team to successful solutions.

**SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS**

**Experience**: 8+ years as a UX Designer with a track record of delivering impactful digital experiences, ideally within a SaaS or similar industry

**Research Skills**: Strong proficiency in qualitative research methodologies

**Outcome-Oriented**: A results-driven approach that consistently leads to practical, user-focused solutions

**Portfolio**: A compelling portfolio that showcases your complete design process, from problem identification to successful implementation

**Tools**: Advanced knowledge of Figma

**Collaboration**: Excellent communication and teamwork abilities

**Language**: Fluency in English

**Extra super-skills:** Experience from working with quantitative research methodologies


If you’re excited to elevate user experiences and make a lasting impact on our core product, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Content Creator
description:
### **Arbetsuppgifter**


Till vår kund söker vi nu en kreativ och strategisk Content Creator som är duktig på UX Copy!


I denna roll kommer du att vara avgörande för att förbättra användarupplevelsen genom att skapa engagerande och effektivt innehåll för digitala plattformar. Du blir en del av en kreativ hub där ni tillsammans använder all gemensam kompetens, passion, erfarenhet och skicklighet för att skapa grym, enhetlig och relevant kommunikation för hela företaget i syfte att stärka relationen med kunder.


Du kommer att utforma kundkommunikation enligt vår kunds tonalitet i form av mejl, SMS och brev, samt på deras digitala plattformar som app och webb. Du kommer att delta i planering, beställning och genomförande av kommunikationsinsatser i deras egna digitala kanaler tillsammans med teamet för att stärka de digitala kundresorna. Arbetet med både långsiktiga projekt och snabba uppgifter, i nära samarbete med olika personer inom organisationen så som projektledare, IT, kampanjtekniker, designers, produktägare med mera.


### **Kvalifikationer**

* Du är en erfaren Content Creator / Digital marknadsförare och har flera års erfarenhet av marknadsföring och kommunikation, både i bild och i skrift.
* Du är van vid att använda olika CMS som Episerver/Optimizely, Contentful och CRM-system.
* Du har goda kunskaper inom Photoshop, Adobe Creative Suite eller liknande.
* Du är flytande i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
  

  

### **Personliga egenskaper**


För att lyckas i rollen som Content Creator är du engagerad, lösningsorienterad och har en god analytisk förmåga. Du är också positiv, är prestigelös och är strukturerad och självständig i ditt arbete.

### **Företagspresentation**


Vår kund har funnits i Sverige sen början av 2000-talet och de levererar mobil-, bredbands- och tvlösningar till över 4 miljoner svenskar. Mottot här är att människan alltid kommer först och tekniken därefter. Det betyder att det viktigaste är att du alltid ska kunna vara uppkopplad med de som betyder mest för dig.### **När du blir en av oss**


Som konsult hos JobBusters kan du känna dig trygg med ett kollektivavtal i ryggen, tillgängliga konsultchefer och engagerade rekryterare. Du som konsult får även tillgång till vårt nätverk av spännande företag och uppdragsgivare! För oss är det viktigt att du som konsult trivs, känner en trygghet och gemenskap till oss som arbetsgivare. Vi erbjuder tjänstepension, löneväxling och möjlighet till flexpension. Du får även tillgång till vår förmånsportal, där du utöver friskvårdsbidrag har tillgång till mängder av rabatter och erbjudanden inom hälsa, hem och fritid, transport, sjukvård och mycket mer! Ditt välmående är av högsta prioritet för oss och vi erbjuder därför dig som anställd Företagshälsovård för att hantera vardagens alla utmaningar, både på jobbet och i privatlivet.

### **Lön**


Enligt överenskommelse.

### **Tillträde och ansökan**


Heltid, kontorstider. Rollen är ett vikariat och vår kund önskar start omkring 2025-01-02 och uppdraget förväntas löpa till 2026-01-01. Du kommer att vara anställd av JobBusters som konsult hos vår spännande kund. Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande och i konsultvärlden går processerna oftast snabbt. Rollen kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan (gärna i Word-format).

Please note, this role must be based in Stockholm with a minimum of 3 days per week in the office. **Responsibilities:*** Develop gameplay code across many different aspects of a game; be it player movement, weapon systems, sound implementation, AI, network, support systems, game state machines, controllers and more.

Whether you’re crafting intricate game worlds or developing the systems that bring players together, your creativity and passion will drive the future of cooperative gaming. Join us in our journey to create innovative, immersive experiences that unite players and redefine what gaming can achieve.

title: Embedded Software Engineer
description:

title: IT-Controller
description:

Vi söker nu en IT-Controller till vår kund i Stockholm!  

  

I rollen har du ett övergripande ansvar för processer och rutiner kring IT-avdelningens finansiella aktiviteter genom att utveckla och följa upp dessa. Det ingår även att budgetera samt ansvara för den ekonomiska uppföljningen av IT tjänster och projekt. Du har förmåga att självständigt planera, organisera och prioritera ditt arbete samt leverera inom givna deadlines. Du har lätt för att sätta dig in i och förstå ekonomiska samband och kan även presentera dessa på ett lättförståeligt sätt. Du har även en god analytisk förmåga och lätt för att se såväl helhet som detaljer. Du kommer att ha många kontakter inom IT-avdelningen och kommer att vara avdelningens kontakt mot centrala ekonomiavdelningen. Det är därför viktigt att du är lyhörd, kommunikativ och har en god social kompetens med förmåga att skapa goda relationer.

### 
**Kvalifikationer**

* Du har en högskoleutbildning inom ekonomi eller på annat sätt förvärvad kunskap som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdig.
* Du har minst 3 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete som controller.
* Du har goda kunskaper i affärssystemet UBW.
* Du har mycket goda kunskaper i Excel.
* Du har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.

### 

### **Företagspresentation**

Vår kund är ett svenskt statligt universitet i Stockholm där man bedriver akademisk forskning inom medicin samt erbjuder medicinska utbildningar.  

  

  

### **När du blir en av oss**


Som konsult hos JobBusters kan du känna dig trygg med ett kollektivavtal i ryggen, tillgängliga konsultchefer och engagerade rekryterare. Du som konsult får även tillgång till vårt nätverk av spännande företag och uppdragsgivare! För oss är det viktigt att du som konsult trivs, känner en trygghet och gemenskap till oss som arbetsgivare. Vi erbjuder tjänstepension, löneväxling och möjlighet till flexpension. Du får även tillgång till vår förmånsportal, där du utöver friskvårdsbidrag har tillgång till mängder av rabatter och erbjudanden inom hälsa, hem och fritid, transport, sjukvård och mycket mer! Ditt välmående är av högsta prioritet för oss och vi erbjuder därför dig som anställd Företagshälsovård för att hantera vardagens alla utmaningar, både på jobbet och i privatlivet.

### **Lön**


Enligt överenskommelse.

### **Tillträde och ansökan**


Deltid 50-100%, kontorstider. Vår kund önskar start 2024-12-02 och uppdraget förväntas löpa t.o.m. 2025-12-02 med möjlighet till förlängning till 2026-06-01. Du kommer att vara anställd av JobBusters som konsult hos vår spännande kund. Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande och i konsultvärlden går processerna oftast snabbt. Rollen kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan (gärna i Word-format).

title: Gameplay Programmer (PAYDAY)
description:
We are looking to hire a Mid-Experienced level Gameplay Programmer to join our PAYDAY team. You will contribute across many different aspects of the game; be it player movement, weapon systems, sound implementation, AI, network, support systems, game state machines, controllers and more.


Please note, this role must be based in Stockholm with a minimum of 3 days per week in the office.

 **Responsibilities:**

* Develop gameplay code across many different aspects of a game; be it player movement, weapon systems, sound implementation, AI, network, support systems, game state machines, controllers and more.
* Collaborate closely with our Game Design team to assist with implementation and feedback.
* Take responsibility for the features you are adding; bugs or design issues are addressed by you or communicated to the Lead Gameplay Programmer.
* Deliver a great end-user experience together with the team

 **Requirements:**

* Experience in a similar GPP role using Unreal Engine.
* Basic knowledge of performance profiling and debugging.
* Familiarity with Perforce and/or other version control systems.

 **Good to have:**

* Experience working with AI features, in particular behaviour trees.
* Experience working on an online coop/multiplayer game.

 **About Starbreeze**


At Starbreeze, we believe games are more than just entertainment—they’re a way to bring people together. From the pulse-pounding, cooperative heists of PAYDAY to our upcoming Dungeons & Dragons adventure, we create experiences that thrive on teamwork, strategy, and the thrill of emergent gameplay. Our mission is to build vibrant games that offer infinite replayability, allowing players to forge their own stories and adventures together.


Every Starbreeze employee helps shape this vision. Whether you’re crafting intricate game worlds or developing the systems that bring players together, your creativity and passion will drive the future of cooperative gaming. Join us in our journey to create innovative, immersive experiences that unite players and redefine what gaming can achieve.


Starbreeze values diversity and inclusion, and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We welcome you as who you are, no matter where you are from or what games you play. If there are preparations or accommodations that we can make to help ensure that you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.

 **What more do we offer?**

* Competitive salaries with annual reviews, generous occupational pension, and referral bonuses.
* Comprehensive benefits, including private medical insurance, annual wellness benefit, and 30 days of paid vacation.
* Unique perks such as free monthly office massages, weekly DnD club and other fun activities!

 **Sounds good?** Then we can’t wait to see your CV and look forward to meeting you. We recommend that you apply as soon as possible as selection and interviews are held continuously. Please submit your CV and cover letter in English.

 *Recruitment agencies may not submit CVs through this website or directly to hiring managers. Starbreeze Entertainment does not accept unsolicited recruitment agency CVs, and will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with us.*

title: Student!
description:
***Är du student och vill*** ***kickstarta din utvecklingsresa?***

  

På Softhouse utvecklar vi digitala affärer, mjukvara och människor genom allt vi gör. Vi letar alltid efter fler talangfulla, nyfikna, kreativa och tech-intresserade studenter till vårt team i Karlskrona!

  

**Vad kommer vi göra tillsammans?**


På Softhouse tycker vi att det är viktigt att samarbeta med studenter och universitet för att utveckla framtidens talanger. I den mån vi har möjlighet erbjuder vi **praktik, sommarjobb** och **examensarbete** på vårt kontor på Campus Gräsvik i Karlskrona. Vi har ofta flera pågående projekt och samarbeten med BTH och har under åren hjälpt en mängd studenter att starta sin utveckingsresa.


Hos oss kommer du att utveckla både dina kunskaper, praktiska färdigheter och din konsultmässighet, genom löpande handledning och praktiskt arbete i team med mer erfarna kollegor.

  

**Vem är du?**

* Studerar mjukvaruutveckling, webbprogrammering eller liknande och har kommit en bit i dina studier
* Är nyfiken på konsultrollen och taggad på att få tillämpa dina teoretiska kunskaper i riktiga kundprojekt
* Har en stor passion för teknik och problemlösning och följer den tekniska utvecklingen på nära håll

Bryr dig om detaljerna i varje projekt och har ambitionen att leverera grymma applikationer med hög kvalitet  
* 

**Om oss:**


På Softhouse är vi ca 300 medarbetare fördelade på 10 kontor. I region Sydost hittar du oss på våra kontor i Karlskrona och Karlshamn, där vi idag är runt 70 kollegor. Vi har kodat mjukvara sedan 1996, och skapar lösningar tillsammans som motsvarar våra kunders behov och överträffar deras förväntningar - vi levererar tjänster och mjukvara i världsklass.

  

**Ansökan**  

Låter det intressant? Då ser vi fram emot att ta del av din ansökan och lära känna dig bättre!

description:

title: Senior Software Engineer @Ubiquiti
description:
### **Ubiquiti Inc.** **is a leader in developing innovative technology platforms for businesses, smart homes, and internet service providers. Driven by the mission to connect everyone, everywhere, Ubiquiti boasts over 100 million devices shipped worldwide, ranging from ISP networking solutions to next-generation IT infrastructure. Our dedicated team of hundreds of engineers, product managers, designers, and strategists fuels our growth and shared vision of revolutionizing the IT landscape.**

##### **Join us in shaping the future of connectivity!**


We seek a highly skilled **Senior Software Engineer** to join our Stockholm, Sweden team and contribute to the ongoing success of **UniFi Protect**. UniFi Protect is a comprehensive video surveillance solution designed for residential, small-to-medium business, and enterprise environments. It delivers high-quality video, lightning-fast local storage, and a diverse camera portfolio to cater to any deployment need.

**Responsibilities:**

* Design, develop, and implement core functionalities within the UniFi Protect media streaming pipeline
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize performance, scalability, and reliability
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of video processing, streaming, encoding/decoding, and image processing algorithms
* Troubleshoot and debug complex issues within the media streaming infrastructure

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor of Science in Computer Science or a related engineering field
* 3+ years of development experience with modern C++ (C++21 preferred)
* Solid understanding of electronic circuits
* Proven experience with embedded Linux systems (ARM processors, cross-building, systemd, fault-tolerance, IPC, debugging, troubleshooting, performance optimization).
* Familiarity with Postgres, Debian packaging, gRPC, and CMake
* Git proficiency (merging, rebasing)
* Experience with ANSI C, build systems and toolchains, debuggers, and scripting languages
* Excellent written and spoken English communication skills

**Plus Factors:**

* Experience with video processing, streaming, encoding/decoding, image processing, tuning, and enhancements
* Understanding of WebRTC technology, APIs, protocols, signaling mechanisms, media codecs, and transport protocols
* Knowledge of media codecs and standards (H264, H265, AAC, Opus)
* Familiarity with real-time communication concepts (media synchronization, jitter, latency, packet loss, bandwidth management)
* Experience with server-side JavaScript and Python

**Ubiquiti offers a comprehensive benefits package that includes:**

* International work environment
* Competitive compensation package
* Wellness allowance, occupational pension, and medical insurance
* Five weeks of annual vacation
* Flexible work hours
* Modern office space in central Stockholm (Epicenter)
* Free lunch three times per week
* Stocked pantry with snacks and drinks

**We are excited to review your application and if you want to know more about us - Click** **here****.**

title: IT-projektledare
description:
**Uppdraget:**

  

Support av Windows 10 upphör oktober 2025 så uppdatering till Windows 11 behöver genomföras. I samband med uppdateringen införs ny förbättrad fjärranslutning med VPN samt förändrad hantering av personlig lagring (H:).  

  

För att möta höjda krav på informations- och IT-säkerhet behöver vi utöka möjligheten till kontroll och säkerhet i den tekniska lösningen för att ansluta till Sveriges domstolar nät på distans. Detta görs genom att säkerställa att vi kan analysera alla dataflöden i samband med fjärranslutning (”Forced tunneling”) samt att vi inför högre grad av  

skydd för datakommunikationen mellan PC-klient och Sveriges domstolar nät (VPN). Det finns också behov av en ökad behörighetsstyrning av fjärranslutning.  

  

I hanteringen av lokala arbetsmappar har vi i dagsläget en lösning för synkning av information mellan lagring på server, H: och den lokala klienten med arbetsmappar. Lösningen är inte stabil med synkningen och den utvecklas  

inte vidare av Microsoft. Förstudien har analyserat hur vi ska hantera personlig lagring och hur behovet av synkning ser ut nu och för framtiden.  

  

**Arbetsuppgifter IT-projektledare**  

a) Projektleda medarbetare från teamen på IT-avdelningen som hanterar klient och nät samt förändringsledare ifrån domstolsutveckling.  

b) Planera och leda tester  

c) Ta fram utrullningsplan  

d) Information om förändringen och info inför utrullning till alla domstolarna samt domstolsverket  

e) Rapportering och föredragande i styrgrupp  

f) Skriva information om projektet och utrullningsplan för intranät och utskick till driftansvariga på domstolarna, samt leda webbinarierum  

  

**SKA-krav**

  

* Hög generalistkompetens, eller mycket hög kompetens inom området
* Har flerårig erfarenhet (normalt 9–12 år) från komplexa uppdrag inom aktuellt område, och har genomfört uppdrag med mycket hög kvalitet
* Jobbar självständigt, kan leda och utveckla kollegor inom området
* Erfarenhet av IT-infrastrukturprojekt i Microsoft miljö
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet att driva IT-förändringsprojekt i mål inom angiven tidplan
* Mycket god kommunikationsförmåga
* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift då all kommunikation och dokumentation sker på svenska
* Kunna vara på plats i Jönköping minst 2 dagar/vecka

**BÖR-krav**

  

* IT-projektledning på annan myndighet

IT-projektledning i stora och komplexa organisationer  
* 

**Omfattning:** 50 %

  


**Placeringsort:** Jönköping  

  

**Avtalstid:** 2025-01-01 - 2025-06-30 (med option på förlängning 7x6 månader)  

  

**Svarstid och svarssätt:**


Vi ser fram -emot din intresseanmälan **senast 2024-11-20** innehållande:

* CV i Word format
* Referens
* Översikt över kravuppfyllnad ska-krav med tydlig beskrivning av kunskaper, erfarenhet inom relevant område samt referensuppdrag
* Önskat timpris

title: Lösningsarkitekt till innovationsstudio i techbolag
description:
*På TechSeed är vi övertygade om att det är tekniken som kommer göra världen till en bättre plats. Vi ser ett stort behov i vårt samhälle att kombinera affärsförståelse, digitalt ledarskap samt innovativa arbetssätt och lösningar med framtidens tekniker i uppkopplade ekosystem. Vi tror på en hållbar framtid med säkra lösningar genom exempelvis IoT-lösningar, digitala tvillingar, AI och cybersäkerhet. Det här är vårt WHY och det fyller oss med energi varje dag. Det här är vår arena.*


TechSeed är ett medarbetarägt bolag som erbjuder konsulttjänster och har ett kompetensdjup inom flera domäner. Vi är på en kraftig tillväxtresa och söker nu **Lösningsarkitekt** som även kommer få en stor grad av inflytande och insyn i hur vi växer framåt och tar ett helhetsgrepp om uppkopplade ekosystem och lösningar. Vi söker dig som trivs i konsultrollen och samtidigt vill bidra till att skapa vägen framåt för TechSeed – Tillsammans.


Vi söker dig som vill vara en nyckelspelare i TechSeed Innovation Studio och vill hjälpa oss forma framtidens lösningar för uppkopplade ekosystem och digitala transformationer. Som lösningsarkitekt kommer du att arbeta nära både kunder och våra utvecklingsteam för att skapa, anpassa och implementera innovativa tekniska lösningar som möter komplexa affärsutmaningar. Din roll är central i att förstå våra kunders behov, navigera tekniska val och skapa skalbara, flexibla arkitekturer som stöder både dagens och morgondagens krav. Du kommer exempelvis:

  

* Designa och implementera lösningsarkitekturer som är flexibla, säkra och skalbara.
* Analysera kunders affärsprocesser och utforma tekniska lösningar som är både kundspecifika och framtidssäkra.
* Agera teknisk rådgivare för våra kunder och stötta dem genom hela utvecklingscykeln.
* Samordna och samarbeta med andra teknikteam för att säkerställa effektiv integration av lösningar i både nya och befintliga system


Vår grund ligger i att vi delar med oss av vår passion för teknik och värdet vi skapar. Det handlar bland annat om kunskapsutbyte och att dela idéer, bidra med god stämning såväl som att skapa värde genom vårt delägarskap. Vi erbjuder dig:

* Inflytande i hur vi bygger TechSeed tillsammans
* En öppen kultur där vi värdesätter olikheter, insikter och innovationer
* Direkt värde från våra finansiella resultat genom bonus och delägarskap
* Möjligheten att växa in i olika tekniska områden / ansvarsområden utifrån dina önskemål
* Flexibelt arbete hemifrån, beroende på uppdragets behov.

**Vem söker vi?**


* Minst 5 års erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt, teknisk arkitekt eller liknande roll inom techbranschen.
* Fördjupade kunskaper inom molnlösningar som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud Platform samt erfarenhet av containertekniker såsom Docker och Kubernetes.
* Starkt kundfokus och förmågan att kommunicera komplexa tekniska lösningar på ett tydligt och kundanpassat sätt.
* En bakgrund i systemutveckling eller programmering (exempelvis Java eller .NET) samt erfarenhet av att använda ramverk som Microservices, REST och API-design.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med agila metoder och förståelse för DevOps-principer.


Eftersom vi arbetar med flera typer av kunder med olika behov krävs det för rollen att vara obehindrad i både svenska och engelska, tal och skrift.

**Om TechSeed**


Vi är ett medarbetarägt konsultbolag i ScaleUp-fasen med visionen att skapa värde med uppkopplade lösningar. Vi tror på kombinationen av nära samarbeten, framtidens tekniker och att gemensamt arbeta för att skapa ett bolag vi verkligen trivs på. Genom att erbjuda delägarskap till våra anställda ger vi möjligheten till insyn och påverkan, samtidigt som det gynnar samarbeten och att prioritera vad som är bäst för gruppen. Detta speglas både i vår kultur och våra erbjudanden, där vi kombinerar vårt stora tekniska intresse med ett kundanpassat förhållningssätt samtidigt som vi har många sociala aktiviteter och en härlig gemenskap på kontoret. Vår arena är uppkopplade ekosystem, där tekniker som IoT och Intelligent Edge används för att skapa uppkopplade tjänster och system inom ekosystem som Smart Cities, Smart Factories, Smart Companies och Smart Buildings.

title: Co-Founder - Chief Technology Officer (CTO)
description:
**Position:** Co-Founder Chief Technology Officer (CTO)
  
**Company:** basense by EpiHelp AB
  
**Location:** Remote (Sweden)
  
**Contract Type:** Full-time, Remote (equity-based role until funding)
  
**Reports to:** President & CEO
  
  

**Company Overview:**  

At EpiHelp AB, our mission is to enrich society with a fundamentally fresh social community called basense which enables user generated reviews, crowd curation maximizing trustworthiness, and a shared economy business model, but most importantly matches people on the grounds they are most passionate about. basense users can generate and curate reviews on products, services, and events, creating a space for meeting new friends, getting inspired by new ideas, send and receive referrals, exchange relevant information, and ultimately, we invite everyone to capitalize on their reviews in a shared affiliate business model. Our business model allows providers to grow sales with referrals from happy customers, ambassadors to earn commissions while driving sales, and EpiHelp AB to thrive as community host.
  
  

We are seeking a senior SW developer in the role of Co-Founder Chief Technology Officer (CTO) leading our technology roadmap and overseeing the ent-to-end development of our platform. The basense platform consists of an in house developed mobile application, a database-connected website, and an integrated affiliate system software. The role is equity-based until funding is secured, offering the candidate with strong buy-in, endurance, and entrepreneurial spirit a unique high-risk | high-reward opportunity. We're at the point of entering the revenue phase within the next 2 or 3 months.
  
  

Tasks
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

* Strategic Leadership: Own and shape the technology research, planning, and execution efforts for the basense platform, working closely with the management team.
* Team Management: Plan, manage, and lead a research and development team responsible for the basense app, website, and associated affiliate system, ensuring alignment with business goals and timelines.
* Technical execution on our Tech-Stack: Develop and maintain core technologies across our mobile app, with currently React Native for app, JS-based frameworks for the website, Node.Js with Express, and Mongo DB for the backend, and Digital Ocean, Docker, and Firebase for DevOps. Our content moderation system is semi-automated and based on a large language model. For the affiliate system we use supplier software integrated into the application.
* Future Technologies: we’ll upgrade the search with performant technologies like Elastic Search, build or leverage neural networks for matching purposes, AI for several use cases in assisting data structure or knowledge generating. A passion for creating neural networks and in reading and presenting digital observational data would be desirable.
* Project Management: Plan, manage and execute software technology and service suppliers which are integral parts of our solutions. Plan, execute and support the basense product portfolio (user community, ambassador community, affiliate systems integration, white label offering) from tech delivery perspective.
* Scale into large volumes: Drive the implementation of scalable architecture to support potential high data volumes in decentralized environments.
* Neural Networks & Analytics: Guide the integration of neural networks and leverage data into data presentation strategies that work on mobile applications. Be part of the solution specification team.
* Vendor and Supplier Management: Plan, execute, and manage software and service suppliers integral to the basense ecosystem.


Requirements
  
  

**Key Requirements:**  

* Experience: 10+ years in full-stack software development with proven hands-on expertise in leading and building high-growth applications.
* Technical Specialization: Strong experience with React Native, Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase, and DevOps tools such as Docker and Digital Ocean.
* Specialization and passion: on fast scaling mobile applications with potentially very high data volume, particularly in decentralized environments
* Familiarity with Social Media Platforms: A background in social networks, knowledge-sharing platforms, affiliate networks, or similar environments.
* Leadership Skills: Strong project management and team leadership abilities, with a collaborative mindset and the ability to prioritize and delegate.
* Ability to navigate complex sytems: Be passionate about understanding, navigating, and operating multiple intersecting technology and business layers with multiple stakeholders involved.
* Entrepreneurial Spirit: A hands-on, outcome-oriented mindset with the ability to endure high-risk, high-reward startup environments that succeed for their unmatched team spirit and will to win.
* Driving Innovation: Ability to picture, sell, and drive innovative solutions.
* Global Experience: Experience working in remote, decentralized teams with a global focus, especially in high-growth, tech-driven environments.
* Educational Background: Degree in Informatics, Engineering, or related fields, with strong experience in technology development.
* Minimum Financial Independence: at least for the initial period of 3 to 6 months the candidate must have financial independence as a retainer can only be initiated after the seeding-round financing has successfully been completed.


Benefits
  
  

**What We Offer:**  

* Unique Opportunity: Be integral part of the management team driving a highly differentiated and lucrative business model combining a fast-scaling social network, user-generated reviews, and affiliate commissions into a unique recipe for success.
* Remote and global: enjoy a 100% remote and international work culture that redefines the work life balance struggle for the better.
* Compensation: This role is equity-based (the candidate will acquire company shares) until funding is secured. Secondly, we have success-oriented compensation, namely commission payments on funds raised and services sold.
* Founding Team: The Co-Founder is invited to build a sustainable business starting from the painful beginning, enduring a work intense ramp-up phase, all the way through harvesting the full potential of this unique opportunity.


We look forward to welcoming you in the team!
  
  

**Step 1:** Initial Meeting with CEO
  
  

* Purpose: Introduction to the company players, its vision, mission, and strategic goals.
* Discussion Topics:
* Overview of EpiHelp AB and the basense app.
* The company's short and long-term goals, especially around growth and scaling.
* Role expectations for the CTO.
* Company culture and current team dynamics.
* Q&A: The candidate’s background, experience, and alignment with the role.


**Step 2:** Interview with the Tech Team
  
  

* Purpose: Present and discuss the interfaces between tech development and operations, familiarize with development process and the interdependencies.
* Q&A


**Step 3:** Meet the EpiHelp AB Steering Council
  
  

* Purpose: Mutual sanity check on team and business philosophy, and ethics.


**Step 3:** Offer
  
  

* Purpose: Formal offer discussion.
* Discussion Topics:
* Review the terms of the equity-based offer.
* Compensation structure (equity-based until funding, with future salary potential).
* Discussion of the role's expectations and immediate goals upon joining

title: DevOps-ingenjör
description:
Är du en av ingenjörerna som utmanas av att ständigt förbättra? De runt omkring dig kanske till och med upplever att du letar fel. Då kanske du passar i rollen som devops-ingenjör på Kvaser.


Kvaser är ett av de mest välrenommerade företagen inom maskin-till-maskin- kommunikation, med nästan 40 år i branschen. All produktutveckling sker på Mölndalskontoret och vi är stolta över att ha all tillverkning i Sverige. Vi brinner för teknik, men vi gör mycket annat också, så vi kan alltid garantera engagerade och intressanta samtal, där du tar den rollen du trivs med.


Som devops-ingenjör hos oss kommer du att vara en nyckelperson på utvecklingsavdelningen. Du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med både hårdvaruutvecklare och mjukvaruutvecklare samt produktteam för att utveckla och förbättra vår CI/CD-pipeline. Detta innebär mycket nyutveckling så som att automatisera byggflöden, effektivisera releaseprocesser och se till att tester rullar på kontinuerligt och felfritt.


Vi söker en driven person som gillar ordning och reda, men som ändå är pragmatisk och flexibel. Du skall också ha ett genuint intresse för CI/CD. Vi hoppas också att du gillar variation i arbetet då tjänsten på Kvasers mjukvaruavdelning innebär att du kommer vara inblandad i många delar av mjukvaruprocessen.  

  



**För att passa i rollen tror vi att du uppfyller åtminstone några av följande:**

* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Linux, Python, C och C++
* Minst 3 års relevant erfarenhet
* Erfarenhet av PKI (public key infrastructure)
* Civilingenjörsexamen, eller motsvarande i relevant område (t ex data eller elektro)
* Erfarenhet av Git, Jenkins, Docker, Ansible
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.

**Vi erbjuder:**

* Ett varierande arbete, där du är med och driver Kvasers produktutveckling framåt.
* Kollegor med bred erfarenhet från alla möjliga tekniska specialistområden
* En olåst utvecklingsmiljö där du ges möjlighet att arbeta med de senaste verktygen.
* Kollektivavtal med Sveriges Ingenjörer.


Start: snarast, enligt överenskommelse


Kontakt & frågor: Elin Moberg via career@kvaser.com


Vi arbetar löpande med rekryteringen, var gärna snabb med din ansökan dock senast 7/1-2025.

title: Senior Data Architect
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Responsible for designing and refining data architecture to ensure the integrity, scalability, and efficiency of data systems
* Developing data models, database structures, and architecture blueprints that meet business requirements
* Play a critical role in defining and implementing the customer's data strategy, ensuring that it aligns with long-term business goals
* Work closely with data engineers, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand the specific data needs of various teams, providing them with solutions that drive better decision-making

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* You have previous experience in design and hands-on implementation, deployment verification, migration / development application to Azure, GCP or AWS
* You have several years of experience in the traditional IT in addition to cloud
* You are an enthusiast towards data and cloud architecture, designing and/or being a strong builder and executioner of these architectures including modelling of them
* It really helps if you are possessing a history of successful IT consulting and architecture engagements with large-scale corporations
* Communication with Swedish language is must as you would be working directly also with customer stakeholders who might prefer local language. Also, some documentation customers are having might be written in Swedish

**Meritorious**

  

* Event-based / real-time architecture experience with technologies such as Kafka on Confluent.
* Hands-on experience on AI, ML, GenAI is big plus.
* Analytics domain experience on technologies such as Snowflake, Synapse, Databricks
* We provide assistance for our customers with their Data & Analytics and Roadmap development based on their Business goals (capturing As-Is state, To-be architecture and gaps) and building Transition state architecture. Experience in this kind of consulting cases is also a big plus
* Several of our customers are working with some kind of agile model like SAFe or Scrum so agile methods should be familiar to you. But if not, we have great learning capabilities also from these areas for you to master

  

**Application deadline:** 20-11-2024  

  

**About Us**  

  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Migration Lead
description:

* Lead the migration strategy, planning, and execution for a large-scale IT transformation, ensuring seamless data and application transitions.
* Collaborate closely with internal teams, stakeholders, and third-party vendor to design a robust migration framework.
* Analyze current systems, processes, and data environments to create detailed migration roadmaps.

* Manage cross-functional teams through each phase of the migration, addressing challenges and mitigating risks.
* Provide expert guidance on best practices for system integration, cloud migration, and data governance.
* Oversee post-migration validation and performance optimization to ensure successful outcomes. w
**Essential requirements:**

title: Security Consultant
description:
Are you ready to take your skills to the next level?


At Accenture, no two workdays are the same, and that's why we love it here! This is a great opportunity to build a rewarding career at Accenture Security. You will work in a team that is relaxed yet daring and ambitious, with talented colleagues who support your success, serving Nordic’s leading companies as your clients. We support your individual skills with an engaging work community where everyone can be themselves.

**Be yourself, influence the future**


We are looking for an expert or aspiring expert in cybersecurity to join our team, someone who wants to develop into a top professional in their field. In the role of Security Consultant, you will work as part of an experienced local team, supported by the global expertise and networks of the world's leading cybersecurity consultancy. We offer meaningful work tasks, a competitive salary, and employment benefits. We are now looking for individuals with commercial, technology/IT, or security backgrounds for the role of Cyber Security Strategy consultant, who have a sufficient understanding of the diverse field of cybersecurity. Below are our expectations for a new colleague.


Whether you have a background in administrative security, architecture, technical development, or experience in cyber defense and application security, apply boldly to join our growing team for diverse tasks!


  

In the role of Cyber Security Strategy Consultant, you will work on client projects as part of Accenture's security strategy consulting team. Depending on your background, you will have the opportunity to help our clients in areas such as:

* Analyzing and complying with security requirements, including technical and regulatory-based requirements
* Defining the current and target state of security
* Evaluating security solutions, current processes, or architectural solutions
* Organizational risk management, data protection, or training
* Understanding technology trends, products, and services and analyzing potential benefits

**We hope you have...**

* 1-3 years of work experience in the security field – more experienced professionals are also welcome
* A higher education degree in a technical or commercial field, for example, focusing on cyber
* Understanding of information and cybersecurity and risk management concepts
* Understanding of security terminology, tools, and concepts
* An analytical mindset and strong problem-solving skills
* Good teamwork skills with an independent work approach
* Enthusiasm to continuously develop your security expertise
* Good communication skills in English and Swedish and the ability to work fluently in both languages
* Additionally, experience with the ISO27001 standard is appreciated

**We offer you**

* Continuous learning and progress – from basic skills to industry-specific content
* Mentoring and evaluation to support your career progression
* Great benefits such as a wide range of wellness services and a flexible work environment
* Opportunities to participate in a wide range of community activities – Corporate citizenship activities, diversity communities, and Fun Clubs
* A clear career path with international opportunities in a global company
* Active support for well-being and resilience. We have received the "Good Mood Workplace" recognition and are currently certified Great Place to Work


We would love to hear more from you! Applications for the position are submitted through our system.


If you have any questions about the position or the recruitment process, you can send a message to karl.kego@accenture.com


At Accenture, we believe that different people achieve greater things together than people who are all the same, and that's why we want you as you are - regardless of your gender, ethnic origin, culture, nationality, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation, and gender identity. Join us in building a diverse work community in the future as well!


Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud, and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology, and Operations services — all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 774,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners, and communities.

title: Pentester Lead
description:
Orange Cyberdefense is on a mission to build a safer digital society. This mission will be accomplished by safely enabling business and helping our customers manage their digital risk. We are looking for a leader who wants to help us make a difference and work in an organization that is inspired by a humble and open culture.


We are seeking an experienced and visionary leader for our Ethical Hacking team to develop our business proposal and evolve our penetration testing capabilities. This role will involve building and managing a team of skilled ethical hackers as well as strategizing and expanding our offerings in the rapidly evolving cybersecurity landscape.


The Ethical Hacking team at Orange Cyberdefense Sweden is working closely with the global organization that derives from Sensepost, one of the world leading ethical hacking companies. This close collaboration allows us to take in projects that are truly unique for this domain.


The local team in Sweden is mainly working with Nordic customers and responsible for performing all forms of complex technical security assessments of IT systems, ranging from testing web applications and external perimeter to internal infrastructure and Active Directory. Occasionally, mobile application assessments and source code reviews are performed as well as custom-made client software and hardware solutions. Operational Technology (OT), Internet-of-Things (IoT) and Industrial Internet-of-Things (IIoT) are raising areas of interest for both our customers and the counterpart in the threat landscape.


This is an opportunity for someone who can help us expand the operations and capabilities to include additional types of assessments such as phishing and other social engineering assessments, cloud assessments (Azure, AWS and GCP) and red teaming down the road.

 **In this role you will:**

* Lead and mentor a team of ethical hackers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
* Develop strategies and implementation plans to enhance the team’s technical capabilities and service offerings.
* Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to identify client needs and tailor services accordingly.
* Drive business development initiatives, identifying new opportunities and partnerships to grow the ethical hacking practice.
* Stay current with industry trends, emerging threats, and best practices to ensure our services remain cutting-edge.
* Oversee the execution of penetration tests, vulnerability assessments, and security audits, ensuring high-quality deliverables.

Support the team in performing tests as well as continuously developing your own skillset by performing your own tests.  
* 

  

**Your Background**


To be successful in this role, we believe that you have a combination of the following elements:


* Experience in conducting penetration tests.

* Experience in leading and mentoring teams, fostering collaboration and innovation with a track record of developing talent.

* The ability to articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders and write clear reports on findings.

* A strong interest in the latest trends and threats in cybersecurity and hunger for information gathered from ongoing education, conferences, and community involvement.

* Analytical Thinking and the ability to approach complex security challenges creatively and develop effective solutions.

* Expertise in security tools and frameworks for example OWASP, NIST
* Strong business acumen with experience in developing client relationships and driving growth.
* Relevant certifications such as OSCP, OSEP, OSCE or CRTL are a plus.

 **Why us?**

* Opportunity to work with market leading technology in combination with some of the industry’s most talented experts.
* We offer a flexible work environment.
* We will provide you with opportunities for development, both within your professional role but also the opportunity to develop within the organization where only your ambitions set the limit!
* A culture that encourages you to be self-driven and curious.

 **The story of Orange Cyberdefense**


Orange Cyberdefense is Sweden’s leading company in cyber security. Our vision is to contribute to a safer digital society by fighting different kinds of cybercrimes. We have about 2700 employees worldwide and 390 in Sweden. We offer our customers services within Anticipate, Identity, Protect, Detect and Respond.


At Orange Cyberdefense, we are all different but with the same passion; and that is our greatest strength. We are proud of our individual differences, experiences and histories and are convinced that we must include everyone to offer solutions that protect everyone. That is why we always make sure to treat all applications equally.


**Contrat**
-----------

CDI

title: System Engineer - Secure Gateway
description:
We are now looking for a **System Engineer for the Secure Gateway** team for a global automotive company in **Lund.**

**Background:**


Our mission is to build the world’s most secure mobility platform. We see ourselves as the cybersecurity gatekeepers for the future of automotive technology. Modern vehicles have evolved beyond mere transportation; they now function as advanced data hubs, exchanging information between cars, infrastructure, and passengers. This connectivity brings immense possibilities but also exposes cars to cybersecurity threats, which we aim to prevent.

**The Team:**


Our team is dedicated to developing and enhancing the Secure Gateway - a solution ensuring that only trusted data is allowed to interact with the vehicle. Using cutting-edge technology, we tackle emerging threats through innovations like deep packet inspection, enhanced by AI and ML. As we embark on building the next-generation mobility platform, we’re setting the foundation for the most secure vehicles on the road, resilient against future cybersecurity challenges.

**As a System Engineer in the Secure Gateway team, you will:**

* Analyze and refine requirements
* Work with developers to ensure applicability of requirements
* Work with testers to ensure testability of requirements
* Coordinate system engineering work with other teams
* Work with a highly competent and dedicated team that is always eager to support and help each other

**For this position the following skills are needed:**

* Ability to understand complex software-based systems
* Know how to write unambiguous and concise requirements
* Experience of embedded systems development
* Fluent in spoken and written English

**The following are meritorious, but not a must:**

* Hands-on experience of requirements engineering tools, e.g. SystemWeaver
* Experience of automotive industry
* Familiar with cybersecurity technology


This is a full-time consultancy position through Incluso in Lund. Start is in December, One year's limited contract to begin with, possibility of extension after that.


For more information, please contact Kanika Singhal at kanika@incluso.se, recruiter at Incluso.

title: Embedded Software Engineer C++
description:
At
 **Coody** 
 , we're revolutionizing consulting by combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment. With us, you'll receive a maxed out salary with a full benefit package, the opportunity to work remotely and assignments that are both fun and challenging.
   

  

 On average, joining Coody means increasing your salary by 44%. How do we do it?
   

  

 The math is simple. We pay you more by cutting unnecessary costs — no overpaid bosses, no luxurious conferences, and no fancy offices. Instead, we invest in what matters:
 **you** 
 .
   

  

 Coody is all about giving you as an individual the chance to have a free and flexible life to live for your own priorities. Welcome to
 **Gravity Free Consulting** 
 .
   

  

 Gravity Free Consulting @ Coody Means:
   

  

* Maximized Compensation: Typically a 44% salary increase.
* Safety & Comfort: Employment with a generous benefits package.
* Freedom & Flexibility: No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.
* Shaping the Future: Assignments with industry innovators like Topgolf, Spotify, Tobii, Volumental, Paradox, Volvo Cars, Varjo, and exciting startups and scale-ups.


**About Us**
**Coody** 
 is a growing and dynamic group of people who are the tech stars of the future. We consists of about 13 different nationalities and work on assignments for digital game changers across Sweden, Finland, USA and the UK, in industries such as EV, Gaming, AI, MedTech, AR and FinTech.
   

  

 We’re more than a company — we’re a community platform. Our approach is built on trust and autonomy. We keep corporate bullshit to a minimum and focus on what benefits our consultants most. Explore our employee handbook for more insight into a genuine supportive, consultant-first environment.
   

  

**What You'll Be Doing**
 As a consultant in Embedded Software Engineering at Coody you'll work on technically, intellectually challenging and fun assignments for companies to strengthen their teams and projects. Your role will most likely involve:
   

  

* Develop and Optimize Embedded Software in C++ for various hardware platforms, ensuring efficiency and reliability.
* Integrate Software and Hardware, working with microcontrollers and other devices to enable seamless system operation.
* Work with RTOS and/or Embedded Linux, focusing on performance optimization and real-time processing.
* Prototype, Test, and Debug on actual hardware, maintaining high-quality standards throughout development.
* Collaborating on product or service strategy, engineering best practices, and fostering a strong team spirit while out on assignments.
* Typically working on 6 - 24 months on each assignment, allowing you to contribute to industries you’re passionate about.


**What We Are Looking For**
* 5+ years of experience working as an Embedded Software Engineer
* Deep understanding of C++, and preferred experience from one or more of the following Python, Rust, RTOS, Linux, Embedded Android, CANbus, QT, microcontrollers, hardware, and communication interfaces
* Experience working in an agile environment
* Fluency in English (verbal and written)
* A doers mindset with a proven track record of getting things done
* A current Swedish citizenship or working visa that allows you to work in Sweden
* An Engineering degree focusing on vehicle/electro/machine/electronics or computer technology/ Degree in computer science or mechatronics


 If Gravity Free Consulting at Coody aligns with your goals, and you bring the skills we're seeking, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today, and we’ll get back to you within a week if your profile fits our needs.
